issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Story

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: *Assessment* _Eucalyptus Version_ {{4.4.0-0.25788.147.20170202git6e5a63d.el7}} Tried to do more complex Cloudformation nested stack testing with the template {{cfn-aws-vpc-elb-asg-stack-deployment-template.json}} (attached) where the {{TemplateURL}} property used the following format: {{https://s3.amazonaws.com/test-cfn-templates-v2/}} This failed on Eucalyptus, but completed fine on AWS. {code} [root@h-04 ~]# euform-create-stack ProductionStack --template-file cfn-aws-vpc-elb-asg-stack-deployment-template.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter ImageId=emi-63ef779d - -parameter KeyName=eng-admin --parameter CFNEndPoint=http://cloudformation.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --region eng-admin@ arn:aws:cloudformation::000162003767:stack/ProductionStack/bdd787e7-de78-49d1-93a1-c489d02a049a [root@h-04 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@ STACK ProductionStack ROLLBACK_COMPLETE Cloudformation template to deploy multiple availability zone ELB+ASG environment on VPC 2017-02-23T03:38:13.486Z PARAMETER CFNEndPoint http://cloudformation.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ PARAMETER ImageId emi-63ef779d PARAMETER KeyName eng-admin PARAMETER InstanceType m1.medium [root@h-04 ~]# euform-describe-stack-events ProductionStack --region eng-admin@ EVENT ProductionStack eb17909d-8aff-4237-9315-78dde436ae78 AWS::CloudFormation::Stack ProductionStack arn:aws:cloudformation::000162003767:stack/ProductionStack/bdd787e7-de78-49d1-93a1-c489d02a049a 2017-02-23T03:38:46.846Z ROLLBACK_COMPLETE EVENT ProductionStack VPCStack-DELETE_COMPLETE-1487821126658 AWS::CloudFormation::Stack VPCStack 2017-02-23T03:38:46.658Z DELETE_COMPLETE EVENT ProductionStack VPCStack-DELETE_IN_PROGRESS-1487821125346 AWS::CloudFormation::Stack VPCStack 2017-02-23T03:38:45.346Z DELETE_IN_PROGRESS EVENT ProductionStack 73adecb2-7640-4050-94fe-8d2abafb2919 AWS::CloudFormation::Stack ProductionStack arn:aws:cloudformation::000162003767:stack/ProductionStack/bdd787e7-de78-49d1-93a1-c489d02a049a 2017-02-23T03:38:44.691Z ROLLBACK_IN_PROGRESS Create stack failed. Rollback requested by user. EVENT ProductionStack db118c13-b406-4d2c-b260-b56ab94f66bd AWS::CloudFormation::Stack ProductionStack arn:aws:cloudformation::000162003767:stack/ProductionStack/bdd787e7-de78-49d1-93a1-c489d02a049a 2017-02-23T03:38:15.374Z CREATE_FAILED The following resource(s) failed to create: [VPCStack]. EVENT ProductionStack VPCStack-CREATE_FAILED-1487821095004 AWS::CloudFormation::Stack VPCStack 2017-02-23T03:38:15.004Z CREATE_FAILED Unexpected character ('<' (code 60)): expected a valid value (number, String, array, object, 'true', 'false' or 'null') at [Source: json; line: 1, column: 2] EVENT ProductionStack VPCStack-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1487821094132 AWS::CloudFormation::Stack VPCStack 2017-02-23T03:38:14.132Z CREATE_IN_PROGRESS EVENT ProductionStack a5416d18-c427-46a7-b8e5-3017590a6fa1 AWS::CloudFormation::Stack ProductionStack arn:aws:cloudformation::000162003767:stack/ProductionStack/bdd787e7-de78-49d1-93a1-c489d02a049a 2017-02-23T03:38:13.694Z CREATE_IN_PROGRESS User Initiated {code} *Signs* * I tried to do a wget for the template used as a {{TemplateURL}} value, and saw the following: {code} [root@h-04 ~]# wget -O cfn-aws-vpc-setup.json https://s3.amazonaws.com/test-cfn-templates-v2/cfn-vpc-setup.json --2017-02-22 19:48:35-- https://s3.amazonaws.com/test-cfn-templates-v2/cfn-vpc-setup.json Resolving s3.amazonaws.com (s3.amazonaws.com)... 54.231.11.147 Connecting to s3.amazonaws.com (s3.amazonaws.com)|54.231.11.147|:443... connected. HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 301 Moved Permanently Location: unspecified ERROR: Redirection (301) without location. {code} When I viewed the same URL in a browser, I saw the following: {code} PermanentRedirect The bucket you are attempting to access must be addressed using the specified endpoint. Please send all future requests to this endpoint. test-cfn-templates-v2 test-cfn-templates-v2.s3.amazonaws.com 9BD94E8656E292CF KXf3tFarOc+f+TrcWumQYfTvCmUEymm2b+N2sH4kFufevyd+8m4uoEzoFkdeLwB7M5xIyQRGDc0= {code} * Template used on AWS: {code} $ aws cloudformation create-stack --template-body file://cfn-aws-vpc-elb-asg-stack-deployment-template.json --stack-name ProductionStack --parameters ParameterKey=KeyName,ParameterValue=marketing-hspencer-admin ParameterKey=CFNEndPoint,ParameterValue=https://cloudformation.us-west-2.amazonaws.com ParameterKey=ImageId,ParameterValue=ami-968909f6 ParameterKey=InstanceType,ParameterValue=m3.medium --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --profile hspencer-admin-marketing { "StackId": "arn:aws:cloudformation:us-west-2:017179026131:stack/ProductionStack/fe2f18f0-f978-11e6-8760-500c593b9a36" } $ aws cloudformation describe-stacks --profile hspencer-admin-marketing { "Stacks": [ { "StackId": "arn:aws:cloudformation:us-west-2:017179026131:stack/ProductionStack-ELBASGStack-1D9LBRIEZ7YRI/4cd056e0-f979-11e6-afa2-503ac93168c5", "Description": "CloudFormation template to multi-az ELB, deployment on Eucalyptus VPC cloud", "Parameters": [ { "ParameterValue": "marketing-hspencer-admin", "ParameterKey": "KeyName" }, { "ParameterValue": "2", "ParameterKey": "MinSize" }, { {{TemplateURL}} properties to the following format: {{https://test-cfn-templates-v2.s3.amazonaws.com/}} The error disappeared. (Updated stack attached - {{cfn-updated-aws-vpc-elb-asg-stack-deployment-template.json}})
fields.summary: CFN Stack Template URLs don't follow redirections for templates on AWS S3

comments.body: [~hspencer]  You are describing that the Eucalyptus Cloudformation can no longer retrieve URLs such as https://s3.amazonaws.com/test-cfn-templates-v2/cfn-vpc-setup.json.  As you describe above, the browser can not see this URL either.  Eucalyptus does not attempt to parse AWS S3 urls as S3 objects, only as publicly available web resources.  We only attempt to connect via an S3 Client via our own Object Store.  As is the behavior is correct.  The URL given is not a valid publicly available URL.  It works on AWS because they are connecting via S3, which we can not do to AWS.  Our policy is that we can only access URLs that a browser can access, or URLs within our own object store.  The fix is to use the new form of the URL.
[~ethomas], thanks for the response.  Makes sense.  Do you think its something we should document in the Eucalyptus Cloudformation section of our documentation?
Change in behavior on AWS, we believe.
